paragraphs.title: Train The ALS Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS

val rank = 10 // this is k
val maxIterations = 5
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val als = new ALS()
  .setRank(rank)
  .setRegParam(convergenceThreshold)
  .setUserCol("userId")
  .setItemCol("itemId")
  .setRatingCol("rating")

val model = als.fit(itemRatingsDF)

result.msg:

maxIterations: Int = 5
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01

paragraphs.title: Show User Factors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

val userFactorsDF = model.userFactors.map(row => 
  (row.getInt(0),  Vectors.dense(row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble)))
).toDF("userId", "userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .as("userFactors")

z.show(userFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Show ItemFactors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

val itemFactorsDF = model.itemFactors.map(row =>
  (row.getInt(0),  Vectors.dense(row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble)))
).toDF("itemId", "itemFactors")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .as("itemFactors")

z.show(itemFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Generate Personalized Recommendations For All Users

result.msg:
<console>:32: error: not found: value model
              model.setPredictionCol("confidence")
              ^

<console>:32: error: not found: value recommendationsDF
          recommendationsDF.join(itemsDF, $"items.itemId" === $"recommendedItemId")
          ^

paragraphs.title: Predict given userId and ItemId - Compare to Model Above
paragraphs.text:
import org.jblas.DoubleMatrix

// User 12663
val givenUserId = 1
val givenUserFactors = userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
  .where($"userId" === givenUserId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Double](1))
  .collect()

// Item 318 // Shawshank Redemption
val givenItemId = 318 
val givenItemFactors = itemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"itemFactors")
  .where($"itemId" === givenItemId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Double](1))
  .collect()
  
// Create JBlas DoubleMatrix
val userFactors = new DoubleMatrix(givenUserFactors)
val itemFactors = new DoubleMatrix(givenItemFactors)

// Take dot product of the User x Item vectors
// This should equal the confidence value in the offline-generated matrix
val confidence = userFactors.dot(itemFactors)

paragraphs.title: Enrich The Item Factors For Display Purposes

result.msg:

paragraphs.title: Train K-Means Cluster Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans

val kmeans = new KMeans()
  .setK(5)
  .setMaxIter(10)
  .setFeaturesCol("itemFactors")
  .setPredictionCol("clusterId")

val kmeansModel = kmeans.fit(enrichedItemFactorsDF)

result.msg:

paragraphs.title: Evaluate K-Means Cluster Model Using Within Set Sum Of Squared Errors (WSSSE)
paragraphs.text:
val WSSSE = kmeansModel.computeCost(enrichedItemFactorsDF)

println("Within Set Sum of Squared Errors = " + WSSSE)

name: Recommendations/03: Item-to-Item Collab Filtering + Clustering Recs (ALS + K-Means)
